betterquesting:10.desc:8:
A well organized storage system is crucial for a logistics system. 

With the ability to use modules through a chassis, we can now prepare for storage modules.

Logistics Pipes uses ItemSink modules to assign storage spaces.

This ItemSink modules can be used in 2 ways:

1. Assign the storage of a connected inventory with at most 9 different kinds of items by setting 9 items as filter on the module.

2. Assign a connected inventory as a default route. The default route is a destination for items that have no other valid storage spaces.

Â§cNote: remember to always check if the default route has additional spaces because items that are stuck in the pipes without a destination will eventually YEET themselves out of the pipes.
